endPage.title: Thank you for filling out the form.
endPage.paymentTitle: Thank you, your payment has been made successfully.
endPage.paymentParagraph: Your form has been submitted and payment has been made.

form_fields.title: Introduction
form_fields.description: The Comprehensive Labour Force Survey (CLFS) is a national survey conducted in Singapore to collect essential labor market information. It aims to shape relevant policies aimed at supporting all Singaporeans. The CLFS provides valuable insights into the labor market performance of the resident population and is crucial for understanding the economic activities of the population.

form_fields.title: Care economy
form_fields.description: Healthcare, wellness, community care, social service, early childhood, general education, training and adult education

form_fields.title: Artificial Intelligence
form_fields.description: Artificial intelligence engineering, artificial intelligence fundamentals, artificial intelligence ethnics and governance, machine learning, artificial intelligence model development and deployment, deep learning, natural language processing

form_fields.title: Digital skills (excluding Artificial Intelligence)
form_fields.description: Data and analytics, e-commerce and digital marketing, cyber security and risk, cloud systems and infrastructure, software development, technology application and management

form_fields.title: Green economy
form_fields.description: Environmental and sustainability management; green infrastructure and mobility; energy, resource circularity and decarbonisation; sustainable finance

form_fields.title: Industry 4.0
form_fields.description: Advanced manufacturing and supply chain; industrial internet of things; robotics and automation; product innovation and quality management; additive manufacturing, advanced materials and processes

How much interest did you receive from savings (e.g., current and saving accounts, fixed deposits) in the last 12 months?

Typically, savings accounts, current accounts or fixed deposits accrue interest, even for modest balances. For example, an account with $1,000 might earn $2 to $5 per year in interest. Considering this, would you like to revise your answer about interest earned?

form_fields.title: Do you have the following long-lasting difficulties?
Does your current job accommodate the working arrangements you need (e.g. shorter working hours, provision of flexible work arrangements)?

fieldOptions: Tele-working (Employees tele-work for an agreed period of time based on a schedule set by their organisation)
Homeworking (Employees undertake work mainly in their homes without using information and communication technologies. Excludes those who are teleworking.)
Job sharing (A full-time job is split between two or more employees)
Flexi-hours (Employees can vary their daily working hours to suit their work and personal commitments as long as the agreed total working hours for the week or month are met.)
Part-time working (Working less than 35 hours in a week. Excludes workers who work ‘on and off’ and temporary employees who work the normal hours.)
Physical workplace modifications (Accessible entrances, pathways and restrooms, adjustable desks, elevator access etc)
Equipment and technology provision (Screen readers, ergonomic keyboards, specialised telephone etc)
Structured and routine nature of work
